title: Social Media - SMAnalysis
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic SMAnalysis made for the Social Media domain. This entity is primarily associated with the process of analysis of Social Media applications' posts.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It must be equal to SMAnalysis.

hasConfidence.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'No unit'. It represents the confidence of the analysis. All units are accepted in [CEFACT](https://www.unece.org/cefact.html) code.

analyzedAt.description: Property. The time at which the analysis finished

hasAnalysisValue.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The type of the analysis.

hasAnalysisType.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The value of the analysis.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

isAnalysisOf.description: Relationship. The ID of the post that was used in the analysis.
